name: Mohammed Buallay
community_title: Google Developer Expert (GDE) in AI and Cloud Technology
bio: Mohammed Buallay is a Google Developer Expert (GDE) in AI and cloud technology, passionate about empowering individuals and organizations with innovative solutions that create global impact. Leveraging his expertise in research, benchmarking, and statistical modeling, he helps entities maximize their potential in the digital age. Mohammed has a proven track record of building diverse projects and has trained over 10,000 professionals in AI across Arab countries, demonstrating his dedication to advancing cutting-edge solutions.

name: A. Enes Turan
community_title: Google Certified Professional Cloud Architect | Cloud Native Istanbul Organizer
bio: Enes is a Google Certified Professional Cloud Architect who specializes in cloud and platform engineering, Kubernetes, Google Cloud, Anthos, and Apigee consulting in the region with a Google Cloud Premier Partnership and Application Modernization Specialization. He has assisted multiple organizations in implementing DevOps practices and improving the reliability and scalability of their applications on Kubernetes. He also has experience in designing and implementing cloud infrastructure, and a deep understanding of best practices for cloud security, compliance, and governance. Enes has a strong passion for sharing his knowledge with others and helping them to be successful with DevOps, Kubernetes, and Cloud Architecture. He is organizer at Cloud Native Istanbul, instructor at Udemy and EC-Council.

name: Abdulrazzak Trabulsi
bio: Abdulrazzak brings over six years of hands-on experience as a skilled DevOps engineer. His current work focuses on Terraform, GCP, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes (K8s), Bitbucket, Bitbucket Pipelines, and Cloudflare. His professional journey began at Medicus AI, where he started as a DevOps Engineer and quickly advanced to the role of DevOps Team Leader during a rewarding three-year tenure. He currently serves as a DevOps Engineer at Algooru and as a GCP Cloud Architect at Dataholic Cloud Services.

name: Al Zoobi Ali
bio: A research engineer with experience in solving problems raised from operational research, combinatorial optimizations and graph theory using linear and constraint programming as well as designing and implementing efficient algorithms.

name: Ammar Mohanna
community_title: AI Consultant
bio: Dr. Ammar is a Lecturer and AI Consultant with extensive academic and industry experience across machine learning, MLOps, explainable AI, and edge AI. His work bridges research and real-world deployment â€” from training AI practitioners to advising startups and building robust ML pipelines. Through teaching, mentorship, and open-source contributions, he strives to make AI accessible, ethical, and impactful. He is particularly passionate about graph learning, prompt engineering, and bringing AI closer to real-time, resource-constrained environments.

name: Andre Sara
community_title: Google Cloud Certified Fellow | Google Developer Expert in Google Cloud and AI
bio: Accomplished technology leader with 25+ years of success driving innovation and transformation in global organisations. Expertise in enterprise transformation with hybrid multi-cloud architecture (GCP, AWS, Azure), User-focused platform engineering and modernisation. Google Cloud Certified Fellow and Google Developer Expert in Google Cloud and AI, with extensive experience leading complex projects.

name: Bayan Al Ayoubi
bio: Flutter Developer and Data Analyst, powered by clean architecture and data-driven insights. With experience in AI, state management, and app design.

name: Ghadi Al Ghosh
community_title: Founder of the First .NET Community in Lebanon | Content Creator @ Dotnet Arabi
bio: Founder of the First .NET Community in Lebanon under the .NET Foundation | Content Creator @ Dotnet Arabi | Building Tech, Teams & Community

name: Hassan Moussa
community_title: GCP Certified Architect
bio: GCP Certified Architect with expertise in enterprise solution consulting.

name: Issa Farhat
community_title: MSc Advanced AI and Generative Systems
bio: Issa has been fascinated by science fiction and advanced technology from a young age, consistently following the latest scientific and technological breakthroughs. Today, he aims to leverage his skills in AI and Machine Learning, combined with his deep passion for the field, to make advanced technology accessible and beneficial to as many people as possible.

name: Jaafar Nasrallah
community_title: Google-Certified DevOps Engineer
bio: Jaafar is a Google-certified DevOps engineer with over ten years of experience spanning systems administration, cloud infrastructure, CI/CD, and backend development. He is passionate about simplifying complex DevOps concepts and transforming them into practical, hands-on learning experiences that empower others to build, automate, and deploy with confidence.

name: Jana Kibrit
bio: Jana Kabrit is an AI Research Engineer, currently specializing in agentic systems and retrieval-augmented generation at AEMS.ai. She has held roles across academia and industry, including delivering over 100 hours of AI instruction at Zaka AI and contributing to academic course development at AUB. Her work bridges technical innovation and education, consistently focused on building intelligent systems and empowering others through knowledge sharing.

name: Jean-Pierre Fakhry
community_title: AWS Certified | Visiting Lecturer
bio: Jean-Pierre Fakhry is a skilled Computer Engineer and Lead AI Engineer, where he leads the development of innovative AI solutions, delivering impactful projects that solve complex challenges across industries while guiding and mentoring a growing team of engineers. Jean-Pierre is also a visiting lecturer, actively supporting AI education in the MENA region. Holding a Computer Engineering degree from USEK and multiple AWS certifications, he combines technical expertise with a passion for education. Jean-Pierre is committed to democratizing AI across the MENA region and beyond.

name: Judy Abi Nehme
community_title: Data Structures Teacher | Mock Interviewer at Manara
bio: Judy started his career as an electrical engineer in smart homes and electrical installations before shifting into software engineering. He is currently a software engineer at Upwork, a data structures and algorithms teacher, and a mock interviewer at Manara, which aims to bolster programming talent in the MENA region.

name: Lara Wehbe
community_title: Founder at TheAIEngineers Training Program | CEO at Fakker.ai
bio: Lara is a Senior AI Architect at Microsoft Partners, specializing in helping companies avoid costly AI mistakes and empowering individuals to build AI-first careers that fill those exact industry needs. Through her training program, TheAIEngineers, she equips students with the skills and confidence to become job-ready AI engineers. Additionally, through her consultancy, Fakker.ai, Lara helps organizations optimize operations, reduce costs, and save time by leveraging the power of artificial intelligence.

name: Laura Jardine Paterson
community_title: Women In Tech | UNRWA Project Lead
bio: Laura is passionate about creating a more inclusive tech sector, empowering marginalised women to find long-term, sustainable employment. She has spent the last 6 years building 2 bootstrapped businesses across the Middle East (mainly Lebanon) and Europe, having originally trained under WPP in London. Now Laura is working as the project lead at UNRWA, running digital livelihood projects focussing on training marginalised Palestinian youth. Since 2021 - CONCAT Tech, an award-winning design and development company, led by talented refugee and female developers. With 200+ international clients, from corporates to VC's, CONCAT has provided employment to more than 200 youth from across the Middle East. In 2024 - CONCAT Recruit, a new recruitment community placing marginalised developers (predominantly women and refugee developers) with remote, full-time companies.

name: Mahmoud Mashoun
community_title: GDG Core Team Organizer
bio: Mahmoud is experienced in building responsive and dynamic web applications using Vue.js and provides full-stack solutions that extend automation on Google Cloud through Google Apps Script and Firebase. He has a proven ability to integrate SEO best practices and leverage AI models such as ChatGPT and Gemini to enhance user experiences. Beyond his technical work, Mahmoud is an active Google Developer Groups (GDG) organizer, contributing to the global developer community supported by Google through collaboration and knowledge-sharing.

name: Maroun Ayli
bio: Maroun Ayli is a software engineer and PhD candidate at Saint Joseph University of Beirut, where his research focuses on improving UI testing automation to make it more accessible to non-technical users. Throughout his career, Maroun has worked on various aspects of software development, including optimizing deployment processes, enhancing inter-system communication, and developing efficient APIs. A notable experience includes his tenure at BMW in Munich, where he contributed to enhancing developer tools and optimizing build processes for specialized hardware. In addition to research, Maroun teaches programming languages and advanced software engineering concepts at the university level, helping to shape the next generation of engineers. His technical expertise spans the latest C++ standards, functional programming in Haskell, and designing robust CI/CD pipelines, with a particular interest in applying these skills to improve large-scale software systems.

name: Mhamad El Itawi

company.name: Eddress
company.designation: Tech Lead and Senior Software Engineer

community_title: AWS Certified | Kubernetes Certified | Scrum Master
bio: Senior Software engineer with 8 years experience. MBA graduate with x3 AWS certifications, x2 Kubernetes certifications, and Scrum Master certification.

name: Mike Majdalani
community_title: Tech Content Creator
bio: Mike is a senior full stack developer who started his journey at a young age as a content creator and is now on a journey to share his knowledge with others.

name: Mohamad Darsa
community_title: ACPC Finalist
bio: Ex Backend Engineer at FOO, Ex Software Engineer at Murex, Data Engineer at Proximie, and ACPC finalist.

name: Mohammad Makkeh
bio: Mohammad is a frontend developer specializing in React and Next.js, with additional expertise in UI/UX design and web game development. He holds a BS in Computer Science from the Lebanese University. Mohammad is passionate about reshaping perceptions of frontend development, highlighting its importance, complexity, and pivotal role in modern software projects.

name: Mohyddine Al-lahham
bio: Experienced native Android developer with over 5 years of experience.

name: Nadine Abbas
community_title: IEEE Senior Member | Google Women Techmakers Ambassador | Director of Software Institute at LAU
bio: Dr. Nadine Abbas is an Assistant Professor of Computer Science at the Lebanese American University (LAU). She is an IEEE Senior Member and actively contributes to IEEE through multiple leadership roles. She serves as a member of the IEEE Region 8 Membership Development Committee, the Membership Development Officer of the IEEE Lebanon Section, the Chair of IEEE Women in Engineering Lebanon, and the Activity Coordinator of the IEEE Communications Society Lebanon. She is currently the Director of the Software Institute at LAU, a Google Women Techmakers Ambassador, and the Technical Advisor of UPaint. She earned a BE degree in Computer and Communication Engineering from Notre Dame University (NDU) in 2008. She received her M.E. and Ph.D. degrees in Electrical and Computer Engineering from the American University of Beirut (AUB) in 2011 and 2017, respectively. Her research focuses on mobile edge computing and wireless communications, developing innovative solutions for next-generation heterogeneous networks, including 5G/6G mobile systems, the Internet of Things, and UAV-aided communications.

name: Nejmeddine Ben Ouarred
community_title: Google Authorized Trainer | Cloud Architect
bio: Nejmeddine BEN OUARRED is a Google Authorized Trainer and holds multiple active Google Cloud certifications. As a Cloud Architect, he specializes in Google Cloud, with a particular focus on GKE and Apigee, supporting companies across France and Europe in designing effective cloud migration strategies. A key part of Nejmeddine's work involves leading Apigee implementations, helping organizations adopt an API-First mindset. He also serves as a lead trainer for Apigee and Apigee Hybrid, delivering courses on Google infrastructure and development. A passionate advocate for Apigee, he frequently speaks at both local and international events. Outside of his professional endeavors, Nejmeddine enjoys practicing Judo and spending time with his family. He is fluent in French, English, and Arabic.

name: Omar Chouman
community_title: AWS Certified
bio: Omar is a self-taught, dynamic, highly motivated individual with a passion for learning and solving problems. He works in teams and individually, driving quality and consistency throughout all phases of software development projects. Omar has worked on a diverse range of projects, from building scalable microservices to integrating AI and machine learning models into production environments. His expertise spans various cloud platforms, with a particular focus on AWS, where he has implemented numerous serverless applications that are both cost-effective and highly scalable. When he's not coding or speaking at events, Omar enjoys exploring the latest advancements in tech, mentoring aspiring developers, and contributing to open-source projects.

name: Peter Bardawil
bio: Peter Bardawil is a Lead Engineer and Associate Director at Speedlane, with over a decade of experience in web development and cloud systems. He's a full-stack engineer who also specializes in DevOps and cloud architecture, working with AWS, GCP, and Azure. Peter has led teams and helped build and scale large, high-impact projects used by thousands of people

sessions.title: From Automation to Autonomy: The Future of Intelligent Cloud Systems
sessions.description: Modern cloud platforms automate deployments, scaling, and monitoring, yet they still depend on humans to interpret alerts, identify root causes, and take action. This talk will explore the next evolution of DevOps: autonomous cloud systems that can observe, reason, and act intelligently to maintain stability and performance.

name: Peter Estephan
bio: A passionate developer with 4 years of experience in the tech industry.

name: Randy El Haddad
community_title: Research Engineer @ Cohere | AI Analyst @ Apple | Founding Engineer @ Avina (YC S22)
bio: Incoming Research Engineer at Cohere, AI Analyst at Apple, and Founding Engineer at Avina (YC S22).

name: Sam Shouman
community_title: Content Creator - samDroid | Co-founder of Develeb
bio: Senior Android Developer and content creator known as samDroid. Co-founder of Develeb, the tech community of Lebanon.

name: Samer Bechara
community_title: Failed 3 Businesses & Counting
bio: Founder of Visibot

name: Sami Shames el deen
community_title: Senior Software Engineer @ Murex | Content Creator
bio: Sami is a senior software engineer at murex, educator, and content creator with a passion for building high-quality software and mentoring the next generation of developers. As the founder of the Software Engineering Excellence (SEÂ²), he empowers developers to master clean architecture, SOLID principles, and real-world project implementation. Beyond teaching, he shares his insights with over 50,000 followers online, creating technical content that bridges the gap between theory and practice.

name: Sarah Rashidi
community_title: AI Architect & Researcher | GDG Organizer | Founder of Code with Serah
bio: Sarah is a University Instructor at Rafik Hariri University (RHU), where she teaches computer science and helps students bridge theory with practical applications. She is also an AI Researcher, Engineer, and Architect with over three years of experience building scalable AI systems, with a focus on MLOps, generative AI, and applied machine learning. Holding dual master's degrees in Computer Science and Data Intelligence, she works at the intersection of research and engineering to design solutions that connect innovation with real-world impact. Beyond her professional work, Sarah is an active community leader. She joined Google Developer Groups (GDG) as an organizer earlier this year and is the founder of Code with Serah, a STEAM community at the crossroads of technology and creativity.
